original_title: Economist falls to death from apartment in Colombo
original_body_lines: Economist Amal Eran Herath Sanderatne died after falling from the 7th floor of an apartment building at Rosmead Place, Colombo this afternoon, police said.
Cinnamon Gardens Police said investigations are underway to ascertain whether it is a suicide or an accident.
The body is lying at the National Hospital in Colombo and the post-mortem is to be conducted.
Amal Sanderatne (47) is the founder and CEO of Frontier Research which provides macro-economic research. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
